trans-unit.source: Binds a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"></xref> (or another <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation).
trans-unit.target: 將繫結<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>至<xref href="System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand"> </xref> (或另一個<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>實作)。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: A KeyBinding associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: 將按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>與<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>主要的實作，<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>介面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]指揮系統。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> is executed the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 在一般情況下，當<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>執行此命令會叫用，雖然命令行為會進一步受特定命令的因素例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需命令的詳細資訊，請參閱[指揮概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain exactly one <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: 除了函式和數字鍵台的有效金鑰<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>必須剛好包含一個<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>和一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: Function keys and numeric keypad keys do not require a modifier key in order to be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 函式和數字鍵台金鑰不需要輔助按鍵才能有效<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify an invalid <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> and a KeyBinding with an invalid associated gesture, either through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or code.
trans-unit.target: 您可指定了無效<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>與無效的關聯筆勢，透過按鍵繫結關係和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或程式碼。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: For instance, there is no validation that prevents creating and binding a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> that contains only a nonfunction key, or only modifiers but no key.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，便可防止建立和繫結無法驗證<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>，其中包含只找到索引鍵，或只修飾詞而沒有索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: Such a KeyBinding will never attempt to invoke its associated command.
trans-unit.target: 這類按鍵會永遠不會嘗試叫用其相關聯的命令。

trans-unit.source: When defining a KeyBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 定義中的按鍵時[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]有兩種方式來指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a KeyBinding in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the KeyBinding element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: 第一種方式，來建立在 KeyBinding[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]是定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>按鍵繫結關係的項目，可讓一個語法來指定機碼和修飾詞，以單一字串，例如"CTRL + P"的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attribute and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> attributes of the KeyBinding element.
trans-unit.target: 第二個方法是定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>KeyBinding 元素的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>相等並修改相同的基礎物件，但會有衝突，如果兩個可用。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 在案例時<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>，且<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性已設定完畢，的屬性定義上一次將會使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: 您可能有的情況下其中例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>組最後將會覆寫索引鍵元件上述筆勢的但保留筆勢的修飾詞相同。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，建議您只使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; 這將可避免模稜兩可，提供最有效率的語法，並可提供最直接的序列化表示。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A KeyBinding can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵可以定義特定物件或類別層級所註冊<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a KeyBinding is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> or KeyBinding elements.
trans-unit.target: 定義按鍵繫結關係的最常見方式是設定控制項範本內<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]藉由宣告一或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>或按鍵繫結關係的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>類別使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to associate with `gesture`.
trans-unit.target: 與命令`gesture`。

trans-unit.source: The key combination to associate with `command`.
trans-unit.target: 要與建立關聯的按鍵組合`command`。

trans-unit.source: command or gesture is .
trans-unit.target: commandor gesture is .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> and the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> which will be converted into a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>類別使用指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>和指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref> ，將其轉換成<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 要叫用的命令。

trans-unit.source: The key to be associated with `command`.
trans-unit.target: 要與相關聯的索引鍵`command`。

trans-unit.source: The modifiers to be associated with `command`.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的修飾詞`command`。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new object.
trans-unit.target: 新的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與此相關聯的筆勢<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: 功能鍵和數字鍵台金鑰，除了<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>必須包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>和一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: The key sequence.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的順序。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: the value gesture is being set to is not a .
trans-unit.target: 值 gesture 是設定為不是 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: 功能鍵和數字鍵台金鑰，除了<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>必須包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>和一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 定義時<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]有兩種方式來指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: 第一種方式，來建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]是定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>元素，其可讓一語法，可指定以單一字串，例如"CTRL + P"的機碼和修飾詞。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the Key attribute and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A> attributes of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: 第二種方式是定義索引鍵屬性而<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>相等並修改相同的基礎物件，但會有衝突，如果兩個可用。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the Key, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 在案例時索引鍵， <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>，且<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性已設定完畢，的屬性定義上一次將會使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a Key set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: 您可能可以有例如金鑰組最後將會覆寫索引鍵元件上述筆勢的但是保留相同的筆勢修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，建議您只使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; 這將可避免模稜兩可，提供最有效率的語法，並可提供最直接的序列化表示。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵一部分<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Key"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: With the exception of the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> must contain a <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> and one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: 功能鍵和數字鍵台金鑰，除了<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>必須包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>和一個或多個<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 定義時<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]有兩種方式來指定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify keys and modifiers as a single string, for example "CTRL+P".
trans-unit.target: 第一種方式，來建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]是定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>元素，其可讓一語法，可指定以單一字串，例如"CTRL + P"的機碼和修飾詞。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> attribute and the Modifiers attributes of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: 第二個方法是定義<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>屬性和修飾詞屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種設定<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>相等並修改相同的基礎物件，但會有衝突，如果兩個可用。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>, Modifiers, and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are all set, the attribute which is defined last will be used for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>.
trans-unit.target: 在案例時的<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>、 修飾詞和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性都設，這上次定義的屬性將會使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can potentially have situations where for example a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A> set last will overwrite just the Key component of a preceding Gesture but leave the Gesture's modifiers the same.
trans-unit.target: 您可能有的情況下其中例如<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>組最後將會覆寫索引鍵元件上述筆勢的但保留筆勢的修飾詞相同。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Key%2A>

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; this will avoid ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，建議您只使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>屬性從[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]; 這將可避免模稜兩可，提供最有效率的語法，並可提供最直接的序列化表示。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreModifierKeys* One or more modifier keys, defined by the enumeration, delimited with a "+" character.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值*oneOrMoreModifierKeys*一或多個所定義的輔助按鍵列舉型別，以"+"字元分隔。

trans-unit.source: The modifier keys of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 輔助按鍵的<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Modifiers*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
